scripts.comment-box: open http://localhost:8080/comment-box.html & npm run server & watchify -t babelify ./jsx/comment-box.jsx -o ./js/comment-box.js
scripts.product-table: open http://localhost:8080/product-table.html & npm run server & watchify -t babelify ./jsx/product-table.jsx -o ./js/product-table.js
scripts.component-lifecycle: open http://localhost:8080/component-lifecycle.html & npm run server & watchify -t babelify ./jsx/component-lifecycle.jsx -o ./js/component-lifecycle.js
